data.name: Talking Dogs
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Talking Dogs the first game from Carson Kelly Games, LLC which is a one-man team Talking Dogs is played from the third-person perspective Talking Dogs was created on Unreal Engine 4 but has since been fully ported over to the next-generation Unreal Engine 5 and has since been taking full advantage of all the amazing things Unreal Engine 5 has to offer below you can learn more about Talking Dogs

A husky named Phil finds himself alone and separated from his best friend Glen who went missing from their hometown of dog-town and it is your mission to find Glen and bring him home

Talking Dogs is a third-person dog adventure game set in a peaceful place called Dreams Island, you will explore and try to find your best friend Glen who went missing from his hometown of dog-town

Explore the world through the eyes of a husky named Phil, and interact with the world around you. As an example, hang out with Brock the friendly bear or Lenny the fox and experience unique experiences while exploring the world of Talking Dogs

Carson Kelly Games, LLC, a small one-man team based out of Pennsylvania, created Talking Dogs

In Talking Dogs you will need to activate Dog Sense which is how you get to the next checkpoint the Dog Sense feature is when you press and hold the D and S button you will activate the in-game Dog Sense feature via Phill's sense of Smell it is how you will get to the next point of interest or checkpoint

upon activating the Dog Sense feature you will see what happens upon activating and getting the Dog Sense feature to activate and that is to have in-game Paws that pop up which will be your guide throughout your Journey in Talking Dogs

data.short_description: you play as Phil The Husky in this dog adventure game set in a peaceful place called Dreams Island, you will explore and try to find your best friend Glen who went missing from his hometown of dog-town
data.supported_languages:
English*, Dutch, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
